properties.description: Capability identifier of the failed message
properties.name: failed_message_id

properties.description: Message type of the failed message
properties.name: failed_message_type

enum_values.description: Car has not the capability to perform the command
enum_values.name: unsupported_capability

enum_values.description: User has not been authenticated or lacks permissions
enum_values.name: unauthorised

enum_values.description: Command can not be executed in the current car state
enum_values.name: incorrect_state

enum_values.description: Command failed to execute in time for an unknown reason
enum_values.name: execution_timeout

enum_values.description: Car has to be waken up before the command can be used. If this is for a virtual car, the emulator has to be loaded
enum_values.name: vehicle_asleep

enum_values.description: Capability rate limit has been exceeded
enum_values.name: rate_limit

properties.name: failure_description
properties.description: Failure description bytes formatted in UTF-8
